title: Main supp / top LF rankedteam
body:
Hi,

I work best with a tryhard adc, don't give me one who can't be bothered with anything but farming. Adc's with potential know how to switch priorities.
Playing since season 1, maining supp and offrole top since season 3,
When playing as support or top, I know how to have real presence in the game, other than most people playing these roles.

I am talkactive and positive!
Don't add me if you yet have to filter ragers out of your team, else I will filter myself.
Don't add me if your plan is to make your team strong by finding flawless players,
**BUT** DO add me if your plan is to make your team great by practicing with the ones who stick with the team until it's no less than that.

Sorry for long post...
I'd give you a potato but I ate all I had

replies.body: das ist deutsch hier also sprich auch deutsch
